page.title: 10MOBILE LIBRARY,WATERLANE.
page.content: The{mobile library}is a service provided for the people of{Edgeworth and{Waterlane.It allows them to borrow {books which they would otherwise get {from Cirencester or Stroud library. The mobile library is a converted van with two walls covered with shelves for adult books.At the rear are more shelves,some with books for younger readers. At the front is a counter where the{librarian}collects the returned books. In the library there are{2000 books {non-fiction and fiction.}It also carries leaflets about the local area suggesting places to go and things to do.Also some pamphlets about hobbies. The library visits each settlement once a fortnight.Waterlane every other Wednesday and Edgeworth every other Thursday.
